All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractVariable<T extends @Nullable java.lang.Object>
    The base implementation for both Var and Val interfaces.
    AbstractVariables<T extends @Nullable java.lang.Object>
    A base class for Vars implementations.
    Action<D>
    A functional interface for observing state changes and performing some action in response.
    Change
    Describes how a Vars instance was mutated.
    Channel
    This is a marker interface for property event channels.
    Event
    An event is something that can be observed as well as triggered, and it is used to inform a set of subscribers that something has happened.
    Event.Executor
    The "event executor" is responsible for executing a given Runnable when an Event is triggered.
    From
    An implementation of the Channel marker interface which is used to identify the source of a change in a Var or Val property.
    Observable
    This represents an event that can be observed but not triggered.
    Observer
    An observer is a callback that is executed when a sprouts Observable is triggered, usually in the form of an Event or property, like Val, Var, Vals or Vars.
    Problem
    A problem is a wrapper for information describing an issue that can be reported and attached to a Result.
    PropertyLens<A extends @Nullable java.lang.Object,​T extends @Nullable java.lang.Object>
    This is the base class for all Val implementations.
    Result<V>
    A result is very similar to an Optional in that it can either contain a value or not, with the difference being that a result can also contain a list of Problems which describe what went wrong in the process of obtaining the value wrapped by the result.
    ResultImpl<V>  
    Sprouts
    Exposes an API for configuring the SproutsFactory, which serves implementations of the various property types in the Sprouts library, like Event, Val, Var, Vals and Vars.
    SproutsFactory
    Creates instances of the various property types in the Sprouts library.
    Subscriber
    A subscriber may either be an Observer or an Action and it is used as a marker interface to allow for both types to be identified, grouped and used interchangeably.
    Val<T extends @Nullable java.lang.Object>
    A read only view on a wrapped item which can be observed for changes using Actions registered through the Val.onChange(Channel, Action) method, where the Channel is used to distinguish between changes from different sources (usually application layers like the view model or the view).
    Vals<T extends @Nullable java.lang.Object>
    An immutable view of a list of immutably viewed properties that can be observed, iterated over, mapped, filtered, turned into a stream, and more.
    ValsDelegate<T>
    A context object passed to the various types of change listeners registered in property lists such as Vals and Vars.
    Var<T extends @Nullable java.lang.Object>
    A mutable wrapper for an item which can be observed for changes using Actions registered through the Var.onChange(Channel, Action) method, where the Channel is used to distinguish between changes from different sources (usually application layers like the view model or the view).
    Vars<T extends @Nullable java.lang.Object>
    A list of mutable properties that can be observed for changes by Subscriber types (see Observer and Action).
